text: The Audi Cup 2015 (the fourth edition of the Audi Cup) is a two-day tournament in Munich, Germany. The participating teams are Bayern Munich, Real Madrid, Milan and Tottenham Hotspur. ==Matches== == Top scorers == ;2 goals * Robert Lewandowski (Bayern Munich) ;1 goal * Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) * Juan Bernat (Bayern Munich) * Tom Carroll (Tottenham Hotspur) * Nacer Chadli (Tottenham Hotspur) * Mario Götze (Bayern Munich) * James Rodríguez (Real Madrid) == References == Category:2015 in association football Category:2015 in Europe Category:2010s in Munich Category:Audi Cup
title: Audi Cup 2015
